casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CARVER 196P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 28, 2019 Leslie S. Robinson, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Carver, David Leroy. Douglas W. Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. State of N. C. Judicial Dept., for NC Judicial Department.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of May 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of May 2019."
